# qSIP2

The qSIP2 R package is a refactored and reimagined version of the
[original qSIP
pipeline](https://bitbucket.org/QuantitativeSIP/qsip_repo). More to
come!

## Installation

You can install the development version of qSIP2 from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jeffkimbrel/qSIP2")
```

# Package index

## qSIP Data Objects

- [`qsip_data()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/qsip_data.md)
  : qSIP master data class
- [`qsip_source_data()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/qsip_source_data.md)
  : qSIP source data class
- [`qsip_sample_data()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/qsip_sample_data.md)
  : qSIP sample data class
- [`qsip_feature_data()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/qsip_feature_data.md)
  : qSIP feature table class

## qSIP2 EAF Workflow

- [`get_comparison_groups()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_comparison_groups.md)
  : Get comparison groups
- [`run_feature_filter()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/run_feature_filter.md)
  : Filter features in a qSIP data object
- [`run_resampling()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/run_resampling.md)
  : Resample WAD values
- [`run_EAF_calculations()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/run_EAF_calculations.md)
  : Calculate EAF values
- [`summarize_EAF_values()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/summarize_EAF_values.md)
  : Summarize the observed and resampled EAF values
- [`run_comparison_groups()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/run_comparison_groups.md)
  : Run comparison groups

## qSIP2 Growth Workflow

- [`get_N_total_it()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_N_total_it.md)
  : Calculate total abundances at timepoint t
- [`run_growth_calculations()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/run_growth_calculations.md)
  : Run growth calculations
- [`summarize_growth_values()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/summarize_growth_values.md)
  : Summarize growth values

## Helper Functions

- [`infer_source_data()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/infer_source_data.md)
  : Generate a source data frame from a sample data frame
- [`add_isotopolog_label()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/add_isotopolog_label.md)
  : Add isotopolog_label to source data
- [`remove_isotopolog_label()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/remove_isotopolog_label.md)
  : Remove isotopolog_label from "MISIPified" data
- [`get_all_by_isotope()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_all_by_isotope.md)
  : Get source_mat_ids meeting certain isotope conditions
- [`get_dataframe`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_dataframe.md)
  : Return the original dataframe from a qsip_feature_data object
- [`get_resample_counts()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_resample_counts.md)
  : Get counts of successful resampling
- [`get_resample_data()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_resample_data.md)
  : Get dataframe of resampled data
- [`get_feature_ids()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_feature_ids.md)
  : Return the feature_ids in a qsip object
- [`get_filtered_feature_summary()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_filtered_feature_summary.md)
  : Return filtering info for a specific feature ID
- [`get_source_mat_ids()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_source_mat_ids.md)
  : Return the source_mat_ids in a qsip object
- [`get_growth_data()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_growth_data.md)
  : Get dataframe of resampled growth data
- [`get_filter_results()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_filter_results.md)
  : Tabular output summarizing filtering
- [`get_EAF_data()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_EAF_data.md)
  : Get EAF value for a qSIP object
- [`resample_seed()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/resample_seed.md)
  : Seed used in resampling
- [`n_resamples()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/n_resamples.md)
  : Number of resamples
- [`add_gradient_pos_rel_amt()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/add_gradient_pos_rel_amt.md)
  : Add gradient_pos_rel_amt to data
- [`add_taxonomy()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/add_taxonomy.md)
  : Add a taxonomy table to qSIP abundance data
- [`correct_gradient_pos_density()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/correct_gradient_pos_density.md)
  : Correct sample density values using gradient position information
- [`get_unshared_ids()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_unshared_ids.md)
  : Show missing source_mat_ids and sample_ids
- [`is_qsip_data()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/is_qsip_data.md)
  : Check object is qsip_data type
- [`is_qsip_data_list()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/is_qsip_data_list.md)
  : Validate a multi-qsip list object
- [`is_qsip_filtered()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/is_qsip_filtered.md)
  : Validate a qsip object has been filtered
- [`is_qsip_resampled()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/is_qsip_resampled.md)
  : Validate a qsip object has been resampled
- [`is_qsip_EAF()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/is_qsip_EAF.md)
  : Validate a qsip object has EAF values
- [`is_qsip_growth()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/is_qsip_growth.md)
  : Validate a qsip object has been run through growth workflow
- [`qsip_object_size()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/qsip_object_size.md)
  : Return the size of qsip data objects or each slot
- [`qsip_clean()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/qsip_clean.md)
  : Clean large data from qSIP object

## WAD Corrections

- [`correct_gpd_bootstrap()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/correct_gpd_bootstrap.md)
  : Correct gradient position density (gpd) values using bootstrapped
  features
- [`correct_gpd_rlm()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/correct_gpd_rlm.md)
  : Correct gradient position density (gpd) values using linear
  regression approach
- [`plot_corrected_curves()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_corrected_curves.md)
  : Plot curves of corrected sample curves versus reference
- [`plot_correction_stats()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_correction_stats.md)
  : Plot the correction statistics
- [`plot_difference_to_mean()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_difference_to_mean.md)
  : Plot difference between feature WAD and WAD reference
- [`get_correction_compression()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_correction_compression.md)
  : Get compression values from a rlm correction
- [`plot_correction_compression()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_correction_compression.md)
  : Plot correction compression

## Plots and Visualizations

- [`plot_sample_curves()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_sample_curves.md)
  : Plot qSIP sample data density curves
- [`plot_source_wads()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_source_wads.md)
  : Plot the source WADs by isotope
- [`plot_density_outliers()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_density_outliers.md)
  : Cook's outlier detection on gradient positions vs densities
- [`plot_feature_curves()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_feature_curves.md)
  : Plot qSIP feature data density curves
- [`plot_filter_results()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_filter_results.md)
  : Plot the results of filtering features
- [`plot_feature_occurrence()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_feature_occurrence.md)
  : Plot occurrence of features in samples
- [`plot_successful_resamples()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_successful_resamples.md)
  : Plot the number of successful resamples for each feature_id
- [`plot_feature_resamplings()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_feature_resamplings.md)
  : Plot the resampled EAFs for each feature
- [`plot_EAF_values()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_EAF_values.md)
  : Plot EAF and confidence intervals
- [`plot_growth_values()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/plot_growth_values.md)
  : Plot growth values

## Spike-In Controls

- [`jgi_source_df()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/jgi_source_df.md)
  : Make a source dataframe from JGI proposal file
- [`jgi_sample_df()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/jgi_sample_df.md)
  : Make a sample dataframe from JGI proposal file
- [`jgi_feature_df()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/jgi_feature_df.md)
  : Make a feature dataframe from a JGI coverage file
- [`jgi_normalize_features()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/jgi_normalize_features.md)
  : Normalize feature coverages according to spike-in controls with a
  known ratio
- [`get_normalized_features()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_normalized_features.md)
  : Get normalized features from jgi_normalize_features
- [`get_normalized_controls()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/get_normalized_controls.md)
  : Get normalized controls from jgi_normalize_features

## Datasets

- [`example_source_df`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/example_source_df.md)
  : Example Source Dataframe
- [`example_sample_df`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/example_sample_df.md)
  : Example Sample Dataframe
- [`example_feature_df`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/example_feature_df.md)
  : Example Feature Abundance Dataframe
- [`example_source_object`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/example_source_object.md)
  : Example qSIP Source Object
- [`example_sample_object`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/example_sample_object.md)
  : Example qSIP Sample Object
- [`example_feature_object`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/example_feature_object.md)
  : Example qSIP Feature Object
- [`example_qsip_object`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/example_qsip_object.md)
  : Example qSIP Object
- [`example_group_dataframe`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/example_group_dataframe.md)
  : Example data frame for run_comparison_groups()
- [`example_qsip_growth_object`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/example_qsip_growth_object.md)
  : Example qSIP Growth Object
- [`example_qsip_growth_t0`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/example_qsip_growth_t0.md)
  : Example qSIP Time Zero Growth Dataframe
- [`isotope_palette`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/isotope_palette.md)
  : Color palettes for isotopes
- [`source_palette`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/source_palette.md)
  : An expanding color palette
- [`jgi_mixes`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/jgi_mixes.md)
  : JGI control sequences
- [`valid_isotope_names`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/qSIP2/reference/valid_isotope_names.md)
  : Valid isotope names
